```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library("tidyverse")
library("tidytext")
library("tm")
```

Ucitavanje podataka:

```{r}
data <- read.csv("../data/complete.csv")
glimpse(data)
head(data)

data$comments <- gsub("&#\\d+", " ", data$comments)
glimpse(data)
head(data, 20)
```

Izrada "corpusa" od komentara

```{r}

comments <-  data$comments



rijeci <- data.frame(table(unlist(strsplit(tolower(comments), " "))))


# Rename columns for clarity
colnames(rijeci) <- c("Word", "Freq")

# Remove English stopwords
stopwords <- stopwords("en")
rijeci <- rijeci %>%
  filter(!Word %in% c(stopwords, ""))


# Arrange by frequency in descending order
rijeci <- rijeci %>%
  arrange(desc(Freq))
rijeci
```
